title: Beyond the Horror: Apocalypse Episode 1
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: I was pumped when Micheal came and the song that was in the beginning and ending of Murder House was playing, it was like a little wink to the fans.
I definitely agree with Casey. They should’ve never said this was gonna be a crossover. They shouldn’t have said Michael was gonna be in this. They should’ve NEVER  gave away information

Theory: do you think Timothy is the son of Vivienne Harmon's sister in Florida and as he is related to Michael and selected for his supierior genetics that is why he was saved? Just a thought to throw out there.
We should have listened to Dr. Artton. He was trying to warn us in season 2 about radiation. He was trying make sure the human race could survive nuclear winter.
if misty day doesn't appear within the first 5 episodes, I won't stop watching but I'll be mad
description:
